content: I purchased iweaveit a few years ago and recently have tried to install it on my hp laptop. The app program keeps telling me it will be installed "soon" but it doesn't happen. Why???

I love this program but now I'm having a problem with it! Now my iWeaveit program keeps on bombing out on my Android phone.  It was fine up till yesterday, but now I cannot access it.  I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling it but it is still not working. I've also restarted and switched off my phone.  Nothing gets it going again.
Love this app! So useful in designing patterns and figuring out how much yarn is needed. Love the treadle and threading tracking, too!
I am learning weaving on a ridged haddle loom, so it's a little bit of a learning curve on both fronts but software seems straight forward so I'm sure I'll get the hang of it soon. I recommend it.
It would be great if it went to 10 shafts a d 12 treadles.
Rising shed only

When I purchased it I also purchased the ad on programs, after I did that, my android tablet I had at the time malfunctioned and was not able to be fixed. so I saved up and got myself a new android tablet and was able to put the weaving program on it, however, I cannot get the ad on programs without re-purchasing them. I've contacted the developer, and Google, the developer has absolved all responsibility, and Google hasn't responded! not happy!
very little assistance. email function does not work

I expected more for my money. As is, it's annoying how it keeps loading the threading color when you go to chang the threadling pattern. it would be a great help if you could see the already saved pattern names when saving a new pattern.

This is an excellent basic weaving design program. I recommend a minimum 7" tablet. Phone screens are too small for designing, but I have several designs on my phone to refer to when yarn shopping. I recommend this program for weavers on the go.
Helpful for non textile
I like it but I would prefer to be able to set it up for sinking shed drafts and be able to decide which shaft is 1
Program won't open on my device any longer. Enjoyed the program while it worked.
Like the app. I have lost the ability to save any file on any android device very frustrating
I only wish that I could handle complex draft more than fifty shafts. Otherwise it's a lovely app
It is the best and most reasonably priced Weaving App.
Great app. Gives me some project planning time when I'm not at my desktop.
Very nice to have something I can take to the loom or with me when designing. Sally is extremely helpful, particularly when all of my "issues" were operator error.
Love the package..have all parts.  Recommend it highly.

Had questions and contacted Sally as suggested.  She responded with the solution for every question within a few hours.                 ( problems were with operator not program). Love the portability and float finder.  I also bought every add on and am thrilled)
I loved this app, but editing sett - related calculations causes app to crash.
It's great but very pricey. There should be a "package price" for those who want to purchase all add-ons.
LOVE,LOVE this app, have added tracking and calculation options too.  Try them all you will love them

I bought a Nook HD plus on sale for the sd card slot to store weaving, spinning and bobbin lace videos. When Sally put iWeaveit in the android markets, I bought it to open wifs from handweaving dot net and track my threading and treadling. I also just bought the project calculator mostly to count heddles per shaft (harness). I also nowenter draftsfrom books and from HW magazine and Vav. Also works great on Nook color (really old one!) And original KindleFire my kids gave me...too slow for them... NOTE! You mustbut for Nook in google playstore and for Kindle Fire in Amazon appstore... I do not have from Amazon as I realized error and they refunded me. I will probably get kindle version for birthday and leave at loom.

I wish it had been more obvious that you have to pay an additional $7 for the ability to track treadling. "Added support for the treadle tracker add on" does not sound like you would have to pay more for that functionality.
The App works great on my HTC One S phone and my new Samsung Galaxy 3 Tab.
replyContent: I didn't realize Nook was android.  Send more information about your color problems and a screen shot and I will see what I can do.

content: This has been a fun app to use with my weaving.
As a long-time WeaveIt user, I'm really happy to see iWeaveIt come to the Android platform...and I'm looking forward to the additional capabilities (e.g., Designer).
